mapper.sql: select d.id, d.parent_id, d.dept_name, d.dept_code, d.dept_type, d.leader_id, d.leader_name, d.phone, d.email, d.ancestors, d.sort_order, d.status, d.remark, d.deleted, d.create_time, d.update_time, d.create_by, d.update_by from sys_dept d
mapper.select:
where d.deleted = 0
AND d.dept_name like concat('%', #{deptName}, '%')
AND d.status = #{status}
order by d.parent_id, d.sort_order
select d.id from sys_dept d left join sys_role_dept rd on d.id = rd.dept_id where rd.role_id = #{roleId} and d.deleted = 0 order by d.parent_id, d.sort_order
select id from sys_dept where find_in_set(#{deptId}, ancestors) and deleted = 0

update.foreach: update sys_dept set ancestors = #{item.ancestors} where id = #{item.id}
